name: ResMac Mortgage
overview:
ResMac Mortgage provides consumers in the US with many different options for all of their needs when it comes to mortgage refinance, a first time home mortgage loan, or other loan based services. They are based out of Boca Raton, Florida and have been in business for a number of years.

We leverage our direct lending relationships and our unique mortgage processing technology which translates to loan rates that are typically below all other major companies. We do not run TV commercials, radio ads or spend ridiculous amounts of money on internet advertising. Instead we rely on a network of thousands of satisfied customers and old fashioned word of mouth promotion to grow our business. We are proud of our humble beginning and our grassroots marketing efforts. Nothing would please us more than for you to give us the opportunity to prove to you that ResMac is a great company offering consumers even better and more importantly affordable options for their loan needs.

ResMac is a leading mortgage lender with a national presence across the US. At ResMac we use technology and a lean organization to be able to offer mortgage rates, be it for a first time loan or refi than most if not all other companies can offer. We are able to offer incredibly competitive pricing simply by limiting our overhead and keeping our executive and corporate expenses to an absolute bare minimum.

As an Underwriter and Servicer of Agency and Government backed mortgage assets, ResMac offers almost all Fannie Mae, Freddie Mac, FHA, VA and USDA residential mortgage products. Our object is to create a positive experience for our borrowers by reducing the red tape associated with obtaining mortgage financing and provide finance solutions that make sense. Our highly trained mortgage professionals are ready to assist you with your transaction and provide you with a superior customer experience.
